lines: I’VE TWO LITTLE HANDS TO WORK FOR JESUS
1. Mavoko Ya Ku Tirhela Yesu, Ririmu Ku N’wi Dzunisa;
Tindleve Ku Twa Switsundzuxo, Rito Ra Ku Yimbelela.
Hosi Hina Ha Ta, Evuhlangini Bya Hina; Hosi Hina Ha Ta, Edyondzwen Yaku.
2. Swinengana Swo Famba Ndleleni, Ku Fika Tilweni;
Swimahlwan Swo Hlaya Bibele, Hi Ta Rirhandzu Ra Yesu.
3. XImbilwan Xanga Ndzi Nyika Yesu, A Ponisa Moya Wanga;
Vutomi Byi Va Eka Yena, Ndzi Helela Eka Yena.
